categories: Category:Confederacy of Independent Systems starship classes

nodes.text: Separatist drop ships were a class of dropship that saw service with the navy of the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. Capable of breaking through enemy picket lines, they carried a complement of multiple squadrons of vulture droids. In 19 BBY, several drop ships were used during the battle on Lokori.
Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel features a dropship known as a Settie-class drop ship. It does not clarify whether this dropship and the Settie-class drop ship are the same.
